articles.description: Woot is hosting a good discount on Apple’s AirPods Pro wireless earbuds. Normally $200 at other retailers, they’re $190. You can also get $10 off the lowest price yet on the new iPad Air and half off the Razer DeathAdder Essential.
articles.content:
$10 cheaper than the competition

articles.author: Pranob Mehrotra
articles.title: How to turn off Google Chrome for Android’s grid view for tabs - XDA Developers
articles.description: Many Google Chrome users on Android just received the new grid layout for tabs. If you're not a fan of the new look, here's how you can disable it.
articles.content: Google first announced that it was working on adding a grid layout and tab grouping in Chrome on Android all the way back in September of 2019. Since then, the company has rolled out this new interfa… [+1471 chars]
